General.Name: Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited
General.Description: Bound and Beyond Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hotel and real estate business in Thailand. It operates through Hotel and Other Business segments. The company invests in Four Seasons Hotel Bangkok and Capella Bangkok; and offers renewable energy and property services. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4.Name: Ms. Anita Maria Chanrasmi
4.Title: Sr. VP of Banking and Sr. VP of Investor Relations & IT
